title: Mecha Kha'zix Skin - Bug on E - No effects
body:
Hello, I was wondering if the removal of the jump effects on Kha'zix's Mecha skin was intentional or not?

I believe it is a bug, as there is no reason to remove effects from a skin - and if effects are being removed from skins, I would request Riot include these in the patch notes.

I am also curious if anyone else has found any missing effects that have not been documented? If so please report them here so we can have Riot reinstate the removed animations, or have them comment on why they are removed and why we are no longer told about such changes.

replies.body:
